cast.overview: Aibileen Clark is a middle-aged African-American maid who has spent her life raising white children and has recently lost her only son; Minny Jackson is an African-American maid who has often offended her employers despite her family's struggles with money and her desperate need for jobs; and Eugenia "Skeeter" Phelan is a young white woman who has recently moved back home after graduating college to find out her childhood maid has mysteriously disappeared. These three stories intertwine to explain how life in Jackson, Mississippi revolves around "the help"; yet they are always kept at a certain distance because of racial lines.
cast.title: The Help

cast.overview: A stage director and an actress struggle through a grueling, coast-to-coast divorce that pushes them to their personal extremes.
cast.title: Marriage Story

cast.overview: A chronicle of three weeks in the lives of several high school teachers, administrators and students through the eyes of substitute teacher, Henry Barthes. Henry roams from school to school, imparting modes of knowledge, but never staying long enough to form any semblance of sentient attachment.
cast.title: Detachment

details.biography: Roslyn Ruff is an actress, known for Rachel Getting Married (2008), Salt (2010) and Marriage Story (2019).
details.name: Roslyn Ruff
